An Ideal Family Entertainer
If you have a BIG family that loves to entertain, then this wonderful brick veneer double storey home in the ever popular Croydon North area will be absolutely ideal.
Positioned on an almost 1/4 acre block the home is deceptive from the front, but once you step inside you will discover the homes true beauty.
The family friendly floor plan boasts 5 very large robed bedrooms, the main downstairs has a full ensuite, triple robes and picturesque views over the breakfast balcony and backyard.
The study off the main foyer offers an excellent opportunity for a work from home option or you may want to make it into a 6th bedroom if needed.
The zoned living areas consist of large lounge room at the front, that will no doubt be the choice of Mum and Dad to enjoy some quiet time away from the children. All this is within a close distance to respected schools, shopping centres, cafes, restaurants, parks, playgrounds, walking tracks and all other facilities you may need.
